summary:
There are different kinds of buzzwords. 

Some buzzwords are useful.  They take a concept that would otherwise require a sentence of explanation and package it up into a single word or phrase...
title: The meaning of “AI”

summary: Art imitates life.  Or maybe life imitates art.  It certainly seems that way in author Yaroslav Barsukov’s Big Idea for his newest novel, Sleeping Worlds Have No Memory...
title: The Big Idea: Yaroslav Barsukov
